title: Ben & Jerry’s – Hubby Hubby
subtitle: Ben & Jerry's is renaming Chubby Hubby flavor ice cream to Hubby Hubby?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Ben & Jerry’s is renaming Chubby Hubby flavor ice cream to Hubby Hubby for the month of September 2009 in celebration of the legalization of same-sex marriage in Vermont.
